title: iOS 17's AirPlay Feature for Hotel Room TVs Now Available at Select Hotels
content:
Apple has announced that iPhone and iPad users can wirelessly stream content from their device to a compatible hotel room TV via AirPlay at select IHG Hotels & Resorts properties starting today, including select Kimpton Hotels & Restaurants, Hotel Indigo, Candlewood Suites, and InterContinental Hotels & Resorts locations.


Apple says more than 60 IHG properties in North America are introducing AirPlay today, with others to be added in the coming months.

The feature allows you to scan a unique QR code on a hotel room TV to establish an AirPlay connection, allowing you to wirelessly stream videos, music, and photos from your iPhone or iPad to the TV. After the pairing process, your device will also automatically be connected to the hotel's Wi-Fi network.
